source.name: Unearthed Arcana: Heroes of Krynn Revisited
source.author: Wizards of the Coast
source.description:
This document presents revisions to a previous Unearthed Arcana, "Heroes of Krynn." It presents the following rules to playtest for DUNGEONS & DRAGONS:
• Kender. These short-statured beings are gifted with extraordinary fearlessness and curiosity. • Backgrounds. This section provides background options for characters participating in campaigns set during the War of the Lance. It includes the Knight of Solamnia and the Mage of High Sorcery backgrounds. • Feats. This collection of feats presents options available to those with specific backgrounds and backstories, as well as an option for characters with a special connection to a deity.
